title: Replace Safran header logo asset with user-provided image

requirements.summary: Replace the Safran header logo file at the existing public path so the header renders the new logo without code changes.
acceptanceCriteria: A file exists at `frontend/public/assets/generated/safran-logo.dim_220x64.png` and is based on the user-uploaded logo image.
The app header displays the updated Safran logo without layout shifts or distortion (maintains the current sizing behavior from the `h-4 w-auto object-contain` styling).
No code changes are required to the `` usage in `AppShell.tsx` for the new logo to appear.

file_operations.description: Create/replace the logo asset using the provided source image (`png-clipart-safran-electronics-defense-labinal-logo-aerospace-outils-text-logo-thumbnail.png`) as input; export as a tightly cropped, clean wordmark PNG with transparent background if possible, scaled to fit 220x64 and remain legible on both light/dark backgrounds while preserving the existing header sizing behavior.
